product_name: REI MultiTowel Lite Small Towel - 14" x 10"
long_description: The small-size REI MultiTowel Lite is soft, highly absorbent, quick drying and ultralight! It's ideal for use has a face-, hand- or dishtowel on backpacking trips. Towel absorbs up to 8 times its weight in water, yet wrings out almost completely dry. Ultrasoft synthetic fabric is very light and compact, taking up very little space in your backpack or bag. Quick-attach loop makes it easy to hang the towel to dry. The REI MultiTowel Lite comes in a small carry pouch.
short_description: The small-size REI MultiTowel Lite is soft, highly absorbent, quick drying and ultralight! It's ideal for use has a face-, hand- or dishtowel on backpacking trips.
